  • Help

    All Classes and Interfaces

    Class
    Description
    BasicPlayerWeaponFactory
    Factory class for creating a basic weapon for the player, represented by a basic projectile.
    BigAsteroidEnemyWeaponFactory
    Factory class for creating a big asteroid weapon for an enemy, represented by a large asteroid projectile.
    BigAsteroidSpawnerFactory
    Factory class for creating a Big Asteroid spawner.
    BigAsteroidWave
    Represents a wave of big asteroid spawners in the game.
    Collider
    Represents a collision detection component using a circular collider.
    Damageable
     
    DirectionRangedAttackingStrategy
    A strategy for performing ranged attacks in a specific direction.
    Effect
    Represents a status effect that can be applied to an Entity.
    Effectable
     
    EffectHandler
    Manages and applies Effect objects to an Effectable entity.
    EffectUpgrade
    Represents an upgrade for an effect with associated costs, level, and an upgrade action.
    EnemyKilledEvent
    This class represents an event that is triggered when an enemy is killed.
    EnemyProjectile
    Represents an enemy projectile in the game.
    EnemyProjectileFactory
    Factory class for creating enemy-specific projectiles.
    Entity
    Abstract class representing an entity in the game world.
    ExtraHealthEffect
    ExtraHealthEffect temporarily increases the maximum health of an entity.
    Factory<T>
     
    GameObject
    Represents a basic game object with position, size, texture, and sprite information.
    GameScreen
     
    InvalidParameterInitializationException
    Custom exception class that represents an error occurring due to invalid initialization parameters.
    MeleeAttackingStrategy
     
    MeleeAttackingStrategy
    A strategy for performing melee attacks.
    MissileEnemyWeaponFactory
    Factory class for creating a missile weapon for an enemy, represented by a missile projectile.
    Mortal
     
    MyGame
    Main entry point of the game.
    ParalyseEffect
    ParalyseEffect disables the player's ability to attack with weapons.
    Player
    Represents a player character in the game, with properties for health, balance, weapon, and effects.
    PlayerIsParalysedEvent
    This class represents an event that is triggered when the player becomes paralyzed.
    PlayerProjectile
    Represents a player projectile in the game.
    PlayerProjectileFactory
    Factory class for creating player-specific projectiles.
    Projectile
    Represents a projectile in the game, which extends the Entity class.
    ProjectileFactory
    Factory class for creating projectiles.
    RangedAttackingStrategy
     
    RegenerationEffect
    Represents a regeneration effect that increases the player's healing speed.
    ResistanceEffect
    Represents a resistance effect that provides the player with a chance to block incoming damage.
    ResistanceTakingDamageStrategy
    A strategy for handling damage with a resistance factor that may prevent damage based on a random chance.
    RestartScreen
    Represents the screen shown when the player loses the game.
    ScreenType
    Enum representing the different types of screens in the game.
    ShopScreen
    Represents the screen where players can purchase effect upgrades.
    SmallAsteroidEnemyWeaponFactory
    Factory class for creating a specific weapon for an enemy, represented by a small asteroid projectile.
    SmallAsteroidSpawnerFactory
    Factory class for creating a Small Asteroid spawner.
    SmallAsteroidWave
    Represents a wave of small asteroid spawners in the game.
    Spawner
    Represents a spawner entity in the game that can attack using ranged weapons, be damaged, and die.
    SpawnerFactory
    Abstract factory class for creating spawners in the game.
    SpriteExtended
    An extension of the Sprite class that adds support for a Vector2-based position and synchronizes it with the underlying sprite's position.
    StandartTakingDamageStrategy
    A strategy for handling damage when an entity takes damage.
    TakingDamageStrategy
     
    TargetRangedAttackingStrategy
    A strategy for performing ranged attacks aimed at a specific target.
    Tickable
     
    Timer
    Represents a simple timer that tracks elapsed time based on a defined period.
    UfoSpawnerFactory
    Factory class for creating a UFO spawner.
    UfoWave
    Represents a wave of UFO spawners in the game.
    Wave
    Represents a wave of spawners in the game.
    WaveCollection
    A specialized TreeMap that manages a collection of Wave objects, using weighted rarity-based keys to facilitate probabilistic selection.
    WaveRarity
    Enum representing the different rarities of waves in the game.
    Weapon
    Represents a weapon in the game that can shoot projectiles using a ProjectileFactory.
    WeaponFactory
    Abstract factory class for creating instances of Weapon.
